The Factory

This factory is located 10 minutes from our LA office and we visit it several times a week. Mr. Kim, the owner, has been in the LA garment business for over 30 years and opened this factory in 2004. Impressed with the operation we decided to consolidate almost all of our knit production here and recently documented the making of our tees.

Quick Description

Constructed from the softest lightweight cotton we could find, this v-neck for ladies fits close to the body but still relaxed. Made in Los Angeles alongside some of your designer favorites.

Factory

We spent nine months reinventing the Ryan, starting by finding the perfect fabric—a search that sent us to China, Turkey, and all over Europe. We finally decided to develop our own fabric with a factory in Long Beach, California. It's family-owned, all-green and vertically integrated, which means they knit their own fabric and cut, sew and finish everything in-house.

Quick Description

The simple yet sophisticated Ryan Tee is back with the same slouchy fit, wide scoop neck and asymmetrical hem. This updated version has a bigger front pocket and improved fabric. Made in Long Beach alongside some of your designer favorites.

MORE DETAILS
  • Made in Long Beach
  • Hand wash and lay flat to dry
  • 90% Rayon 10% Polyester
  • Women’s relaxed fit, true to size.
  • Have a fit question? Email fit@everlane.com.
  • Model Amanda is 5'9" tall, size 25 waist and is wearing a small.

productName: The Raglan Boat Neck Heather Grey
extraInformation:
More Details
  • 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester
  • Slim fit
  • Made in Los Angeles
  • Model is 5'10" and is wearing an extra small.
  • Have a fit question? Email fit@everlane.com.
The Factory

This factory is located 10 minutes from our LA office, so we get a chance to visit often. Mr. Kim, the owner, has been in the LA garment business for over 30 years and opened this factory in 2004. It’s not unusual to see our production team on-site checking in on the quality of our product before it’s shipped to our warehouse.

Quick Description

A modern, gamine look, our Raglan Boat Neck features a slim cropped fit and a graceful scoopneck. It’s made of a neoprene-inspired French Terry fabric—structured but still soft with a little bit of stretch. The shorter body pairs well with a high waist but also looks lovely with shirttails hanging out.

The Factory

This factory is located 10 minutes from our LA office, so we get a chance to visit often. Mr. Kim, the owner, has been in the LA garment business for over 30 years and opened this factory in 2004. It’s not unusual to see our production team on-site checking in on the quality of our product before it’s shipped to our warehouse.

The Factory

We make our Seed Stitch sweaters in Dongguan, China in a small, three-story sweater manufacturing facility that employs just 120 people. The small scale of the operation allows the factory to consistently deliver top-notch knits. Quality is important for the owner and his partner – a native of Los Angeles, where they run their other factory not too far from our own LA office.

The Factory

Located in Hangzhou, China—known as one of the country's most beautiful cities—we last visited this factory in January. We landed here in late 2011, the result of a long search for the best silk factory. We were so impressed by their facility and expertise that we brought our Oxfords and Poplin under the same roof.

Quick Description

Made from lightweight cotton poplin, this longsleeve shirt is a versatile piece for your summer wardrobe. Featuring a hidden front placket, mother of pearl buttons, back yoke, seam detailing and clean collar. Fitted with a slight taper at the waist.
